wrappers.html:
<% TITLE %> 
	
	
	
	<% CSS %> 
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	

	
	
	 
        
        
        
        
	<% utilities %><% functions %>
	
	
	<% set-js %>
	
     
    <body id="" class="g- code- store- storetype- account- parent-">
	
	<% header %>
	<% NAVIGATION %>
	<% menus %>
	
	    
<% SUBACCOUNTS %>
	
	
	    

	        
	        
	    
	    
<% ALERTS %>
	

	
		<% BOARD %> 
		<% COPYRIGHT %>
		<% BOARD HEADER %>
	

	
	
		<% scripts %>
		function read_alerts() {
		    document.querySelectorAll('.nav--popout').forEach(menu => menu.classList.remove('is-open'));
		    document.querySelectorAll('.button--menu').forEach(menu => menu.classList.remove('is-open'));
		    document.querySelector('.invisibleEl').classList.remove('menu-open');
		    $.get( "index.php?recent_alerts=1&read=1", function( data ) {
		        $( "#recent_alerts_data" ).html( data );
		    });
		    document.querySelector(`button[data-menu="alerts"]`).dataset.new = 0;
		}

templates.item:
<a name='entry' class="anchorLink"> <section class="post g-7 type-Character p-1" data-full-name="" data-author=""> <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="post--permalink" data-clipboard-text="">
<div id="pid_"> -->

<section class="profile g- type--">
	


        Ratings
        
        
        
	



    let ratings = [
      {'type': 'lang','value': ''},
      {'type': 'sex','value': ''},
      {'type': 'vio','value': ''}
    ];
    let images = {
      'tall-1': ``,
      'tall-2': ``,
      'wide-1': ``,
      'square-1': ``,
      'square-2': ``,
      'square-3': ``,
    };
    let birthday = {
      'year': ``,
      'month': setMonth(``),
      'day': ``,
    }
    
    if(oocGroups.includes(``) || (optGroups.includes(``) && ``.toLowerCase() === `member`)) {
      initMember();
    } else {
      initCharacter(``, images, ``, ``, birthday);
    }
    
    initProfile(``, ratings);
